resources.string: You wake up in the middle of a zombie apocalypse. \n You go outside and come across a fork in the road
You kill a zombie. \n You hear the voices of humans in the distance.
You see someone running toward you in the distance.
You run to the side and look for a place to hide
You hide behind the bushes and eventually fall asleep. A group of zombies find you and eat you :(
You enter the house and find out that it is actually infested with zombies! You get bit by a zombie and turn into one :(
You live the rest of your life happily as a zombie
Your zombie friends shun and abandon you. \n You die alone from hunger as a lonely and misunderstood zombie :(
You run towards them and see that they are badly injured.
You tend to their wounds. They thank you by giving you their extra supplies.
You run off in search of help. Along the way you run into a zombie. Which weapon do you use to fight?
You miss and get eaten by the zombie.
You successfully kill the zombie and continue on.
As you walk into town you notice that there are no people around.
